original_title: LG Election 2023: Postal Voting further delayed
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Postal Voting for the 2023 Local Government Election has been further delayed.
The Election Commission in a statement on Thursday (23) announced that postal voting scheduled for the 28th, 29th, 30th  and 31st of March, and the 3rd of April 2023, will not go ahead as planned.
